reviewtext: The first time i used this lens i fell in love with it!! it may not be the most expensive fancy lens available, but it takes some damn good shots! the auto focus is a little slow, maybe not as great as some others but not a big deal if you don't mind manual focus. for the price this is one of my favorites! Feels like a quality lens in hand and connects to my camera (rebel t3i) with no issues. If you are looking for an affordable lens that takes professional quality photos i would look here first!
